author: Paula Koelemeijer
description: Earth's magnetic field has reversed periodically throughout the planet's history. Now, we're a little closer to understanding why.
title: Earth’s magnetic field is about to flip—and a ‘giant lava lamp’ in Earth’s core is the driving force

author: Andrew Tarantola
description: Our radio signals may be helping defend the Earth against space radiation.
title: Earth's radio signals may be protecting it from space radiation

description: Take a brand new look at the Middle-earth sequel, including new locations like the Island of Nurn, Cirith Ungol, Gorgoroth, and more
title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Open World Gameplay Trailer - IGN Video

description: Saturn’s largest moon resembles Earth with its rivers and mountains, but it came by its topography very differently - and could still be active today
title: Titan’s riverbeds show a terrain built more like Mars than Earth

author: Jacob Kastrenakes
title: Apple patented a pizza box, for pizzas

author: BBC News
description: Ladies and gentlemen, children  of all ages, say goodbye to the  ‘Greatest Show on Earth’.
title: The Circus Leaves Town - BBC News

author: Scott K. Johnson
description: Earth, Mars, and Titan all have channels, but different geologic pasts.
title: River channels on three worlds reveal a history of shifting landscapes

author: Arjun Kharpal
description: The capsule containing the ashes will orbit the Earth for two years before re-entering the atmosphere "as as shooting star".
title: You can send your loved one's ashes into space on Elon Musk's SpaceX rocket for $2,500

author: Austa Somvichian-Clausen
description: The Southeast Asian apes suckle for longer than any other primate on Earth, a new study says.
title: Orangutans Nurse For a Record-Breaking Amount of Time

author: https://www.facebook.com/richardhartleyparkinson
description: 'Today on Planet Earth in Barnsley we have a rare mating ritual between a hippopotopig and a female rhinoceros.'
title: Couple caught having sex behind a wall are given David Attenborough treatment
